title: Iggy Pop Announces Concert Album Live at Montreux Jazz Festival 2023
description: The release will arrive on Blu-ray, CD, vinyl, and digital download on January 24th. Iggy Pop Announces Concert Album Live at Montreux Jazz Festival 2023 Spencer Kaufman
author: Spencer Kaufman
excerpt: Iggy Pop has announced a new concert album, Live at Montreux Festival 2023. Ahead of its release, the punk icon has unveiled his performance of "Five Foot One."
text: Iggy Pop has announced a new concert album, Live at Montreux Festival 2023. Ahead of its January 24th release, the punk icon has unveiled his performance of the song “Five Foot One.” Live at Montreux Festival 2023 was filmed and recorded during Iggy’s July 6th, 2023, set at the Montreux Jazz Festival, where the punk godfather performed to a packed house at the Stravinski Auditorium. Get Iggy Pop Tickets Here The career-spanning 18-song setlist features Stooges classics like “T.V. Eye,” “Raw Power,” and “I Wanna Be Your Dog,” alongside solo favorites such as “The Passenger,” “Lust for Life,” and “Nightclubbing.” The concert closes with “Frenzy” from Iggy’s most recent solo album, 2023’s “Every Loser.” Live at Montreux Festival 2023 will be released as a Blu-ray+CD Digipak, a 2-LP Gatefold, and a digital download via earMUSIC, with pre-orders available via Amazon. “I give something extra every time I do Montreux Jazz,” stated Iggy of the performance. “In ’23 it was deep cuts like ‘Mass Production,’ ‘Endless Sea,’ ‘Five Foot One’ and a hell of a lot of sweat.” At 77 years old, Iggy Pop is still going strong. He closes out 2024 with a gig at the Corona Capital festival in Mexico City on November 17th, and already has a few dates lined up for 2025, including a March 24th show in Chicago (pick up tickets here). Watch Iggy Pop performing “Five Foot One” from Live at Montreux Festival 2023, and see the artwork and tracklist, below. Live at Montreux Jazz Festival 2023 Artwork: Live at Montreux Jazz Festival 2023 Tracklist: 01. Rune * 02. Five Foot One 03. T.V. Eye 04. Modern Day Ripoff 05. Raw Power 06. Gimme Danger 07. The Passenger 08. Lust for Life 09. Endless Sea 10. Death Trip 11. Sick of You 12. I Wanna Be Your Dog 13. Search and Destroy 14. Mass Production 15. Nightclubbing 16. Down on the Street 17. Loose 18. Frenzy * Blu-ray/download video only
html:
Iggy Pop has announced a new concert album, Live at Montreux Festival 2023. Ahead of its January 24th release, the punk icon has unveiled his performance of the song “Five Foot One.”

Live at Montreux Festival 2023 was filmed and recorded during Iggy’s July 6th, 2023, set at the Montreux Jazz Festival, where the punk godfather performed to a packed house at the Stravinski Auditorium.

Get Iggy Pop Tickets Here

The career-spanning 18-song setlist features Stooges classics like “T.V. Eye,” “Raw Power,” and “I Wanna Be Your Dog,” alongside solo favorites such as “The Passenger,” “Lust for Life,” and “Nightclubbing.” The concert closes with “Frenzy” from Iggy’s most recent solo album, 2023’s “Every Loser.”

Live at Montreux Festival 2023 will be released as a Blu-ray+CD Digipak, a 2-LP Gatefold, and a digital download via earMUSIC, with pre-orders available via Amazon.

“I give something extra every time I do Montreux Jazz,” stated Iggy of the performance. “In ’23 it was deep cuts like ‘Mass Production,’ ‘Endless Sea,’ ‘Five Foot One’ and a hell of a lot of sweat.”

At 77 years old, Iggy Pop is still going strong. He closes out 2024 with a gig at the Corona Capital festival in Mexico City on November 17th, and already has a few dates lined up for 2025, including a March 24th show in Chicago (pick up tickets here).

Watch Iggy Pop performing “Five Foot One” from Live at Montreux Festival 2023, and see the artwork and tracklist, below.

Live at Montreux Jazz Festival 2023 Artwork:

Live at Montreux Jazz Festival 2023 Tracklist:
01. Rune *
02. Five Foot One
03. T.V. Eye
04. Modern Day Ripoff
05. Raw Power
06. Gimme Danger
07. The Passenger
08. Lust for Life
09. Endless Sea
10. Death Trip
11. Sick of You
12. I Wanna Be Your Dog
13. Search and Destroy
14. Mass Production
15. Nightclubbing
16. Down on the Street
17. Loose
18. Frenzy

* Blu-ray/download video only
